'''Yul Summerstar''' was a [[moon elven]] leatherworker and furrier for hire from the city of [[Neverwinter]], active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: During her armorer for hire days in the late 15{{th}} century DR, Yul Summerstar's work was guided by one simple rule: the resulting clothing or armor should always be at least as beautiful as the animal who died for its fur and hide.
